com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.event

Interface IHandlerListDecorator<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public interface IHandlerListDecorator<T>
    Essentially a "mini plugin" for HandlerListClassLoader which allows alterations of the generated bytecode.
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Called immediately before the interface method invocation bytecode is injected.
